classroom.rescaleOp

Class RescaleOp

  • java.lang.Object
    • visual.statik.sampled.IdentityOp
      • classroom.rescaleOp.RescaleOp
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.BufferedImageOp

    public class RescaleOp
extends visual.statik.sampled.IdentityOp
    This class is used to rescale a BufferedImage.
    Author:
    Prof. David Bernstein, Ben Kirtley This work complies with the James Madison University honor code
